selectedWord.desc: a.反常的,不正常的,不规则的
wordGroup: abnormal behavior 异常行为；变态行为
abnormal sound 不正常声音；杂音
example: That is simply abnormal. 那简直是反常的。
The machinist pressed his ear to the instrument in order to listen and tell where the abnormal sound came from. 机械师把耳朵紧贴在仪器上想听出和找出反常的声音出自何处。 《21世纪大英汉词典》
They have one abnormal gene from that parent and one normal gene from the other parent. 他们具有来自父母一方的一个异常基因和来自父母另一方的一个正常基因。
